description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Racedrome is back! Featuring a new game engine that takes the series to the next level, and backed by a powerful soundtrack, this indoor dirt track racer will put your driving skills to the test.
description.short: The Racedrome is back! Featuring a new game engine that takes the series to the next level, and backed by a powerful soundtrack, this indoor dirt track racer will put your driving skills to the test.
